00038 /*! Provides interfaces to update data in a "Calvin" binary "signal" data file.
00039  * This class assumes that the file has been completely written and that
00040  * only existing data groups/sets/rows/cols are being modified.
00041  */
00042 class CalvinCHPFileUpdater : public DataSetUpdater
00043 {
00044 public:
00045         /*! Constructor */
00046         CalvinCHPFileUpdater();
00047 
00048         /*! Destructor */
00049         ~CalvinCHPFileUpdater();
00050 
00051         /*! Initialize the class given a "calvin" data file.
00052          * @param file The name of the file.
00053          * @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FileNotFoundException The file does not exist.
00054          * @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidVersionException The file version does not match.
00055          * @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidFileTypeException The file is not of the right type.
00056          */
00057         void Initialize(const char *file);
00058 
00059         /*! Open CHP signal file and initialize it.
00060          * @param fileName The name of the CHP signal file.
00061          */
00062         void OpenCHPFile(const char *fileName);
00063 
00064         /*! Seek to appropriate file position and update expression signal
00065          * @param row The row index.
00066          * @param quantification The new quantification value.
00067          */
00068         void UpdateExpressionQuantification(int row, float quantification);
00069         
00070         /*! Seek to appropriate file position and update expression signal vector
00071          * @param row_start The start row for updating.
00072          * @param expressionSignalBuffer The vector contain all buffered signals to be updated.
00073          */
00074         void UpdateExpressionQuantificationBuffer(int row_start, std::vector<float> &expressionSignalBuffer);
00075 
00076         /*! Seek to appropriate file position and update expression signal vector
00077          * @param row_start The start row for updating.
00078          * @param expressionSignalBuffer The vector contain all buffered signals to be updated.
00079          */
00080         void UpdateExpressionQuantificationDetectionBuffer(int row_start, std::vector<std::pair<float, float> > &expressionSignalBuffer);
00081 
00082         /*! Seek to appropriate file position and update genotype entry
00083          * @param row The row index.
00084          * @param call CHP call representation.
00085          * @param confidence CHP confidence value.
00086          * @param RAS1 CHP RAS1 value.
00087          * @param RAS2 CHP RAS2 value.
00088          * @param aaCall CHP aaCall value.
00089          * @param abCall CHP abCall value.
00090          * @param bbCall CHP bbCall value.
00091          * @param noCall CHP noCall value.
00092          */
00093         void UpdateGenotypeEntry(int row, u_int8_t call, float confidence, float RAS1, float RAS2, float aaCall, float abCall, float bbCall, float noCall);
00094 
00095         /*! Seek to appropriate file position and update genotype entry vector
00096          * @param row_start The start row for updating.
00097          * @param genotypeBufferEntry The vector contain all buffered entries to be updated.
00098          */
00099         void UpdateGenotypeEntryBuffer(int row_start, const std::vector<CHPFileBufferWriter::GenotypeBufferEntry> &genotypeEntryBuffer);
00100 
00101         /*! Seek to appropriate file position and update genotype entry
00102      * @param dataType The data type.
00103          * @param row The row index.
00104          * @param call CHP call representation.
00105          * @param confidence CHP confidence value.
00106          */
00107         void UpdateMultiDataGenotypeEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int row, const affymetrix_calvin_data::ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData &entry);

00109         /*! Seek to appropriate file position and update genotype entry vector
00110      * @param dataType The data type.
00111          * @param row_start The start row for updating.

00117      * @param dataType The data type.
00118          * @param row_start The start row for updating.
00119      * @param bufferEntrySize The size of the buffer for a given element in the vector
00120          * @param genotypeBufferEntry The vector contain all buffered entries to be updated.
00121          */
